Are your initiatives delivering the results that matter most? It’s time to stop guessing and start showing real impact. ROI Boot Camp is a one-day, virtual workshop designed to help you build the skills needed to demonstrate the value of your work. 
Here's What You Can Expect
Evaluation Strategies:
 Explore the five levels of evaluation to uncover key insights.
Proven Methodology:
 Understand the ROI Methodology®, aligned with ISO/TS 30347:2023 for measuring impact, validates the value of your initiatives.
Practical Applications: 
Learn to calculate benefit-cost ratio and ROI.
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp for $297 and take the first step towards elevating your impact and ROI!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What Others Are Saying
"ROI Boot Camp made the ROI process incredibly easy to understand and apply while helping me build the confidence to measure and communicate impact effectively."
"This workshop delivers invaluable skills at an affordable price—one day of training that pays for itself in measurable results."

subject: Register Now for Measurement Simplified Workshop
body:
Designed for those new to L&D measurement and for those who want a refresher! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Unsure what to measure? Don't know where to start? Need a framework to make sense of it all?
Join us for 
Measurement Simplified
 and gain the confidence and skills to measure what matters in learning & development. In just four hours, you'll learn how to select, apply, and report on key measures—without needing any prior experience.
What You Can Expect
Guided by the Talent Development Reporting Principles (TDRp), a proven framework for L&D measurement, this live virtual workshop will show you how to select, apply, and effectively report on measures. 
Facilitated by measurement experts Dave Vance and Peggy Parskey, co-authors of 
Measurement Demystified
, this workshop will help you learn:
How the TDRp framework brings structure and clarity
Essential terminology every L&D professional should know 
Key metrics to track for both individual programs and your entire L&D function
How to calculate and clearly communicate results that resonate with stakeholders
No previous measurement experience required—just bring your curiosity! 
This session is limited to 15 participants, so enroll today to ensure your spot!
 
 
 
 
 
 
Register Now for Measurement Simplified

subject: Demonstrating the Impact and ROI of DEI
body:
Make your DEI efforts count — and prove that they do! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Demonstrating the Impact and ROI of DEI
April 2, 2025 —1:00 pm CT
Recent data shows a growing trend: 1 in 8 companies are scaling back or eliminating their DEI programs. 
Why? 
49% cite political shifts. 
36% point to a lack of measurable ROI. 
But for the organizations holding firm, the reason is clear — the value of DEI still outweighs the cost
. 
So how can you prove that your DEI investments deliver real business impact?
Join us for a webinar with Patti P. Phillips, Ph.D., CEO, ROI Institute, to learn how to make DEI initiatives work and be able to prove their worth.
 
What You'll Learn
 
 
 
 
 
 
✅  How to create value by investing in DEI
✅  Proven strategies to demonstrate impact and ROI
✅  Actionable steps to align DEI with core business goals
 
 
 
 
 
 
This session is ideal for HR leaders, DEI professionals, and executives who want to drive inclusion and performance — while maintaining executive support.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Register Now

subject: Can You Credibly Prove Your Project is Worth it?
body:
ROI Institute Can Help ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Important, expensive, and strategic projects often receive a high level of scrutiny. Supporters, sponsors, and top executives all want to know if the project is worth it. 
Is it a good investment? What is the impact? What is the ROI? 
ROI Institute Can Help
Our team of evaluation experts will guide and assist you in proving the value of your work. Whether conducting an evaluation study, implementing a needs assessment, designing data collection instruments, or analyzing data, ROI Institute offers a variety of consulting services. 
We can conduct an independent evaluation of your program.
We can work together with your team to conduct an evaluation.
We can teach you how to conduct an evaluation through ROI Certification®.
By leveraging ROI Institute's expert services, you are investing in a trusted partner committed to helping you achieve the highest possible value from your investments. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Learn More About Our Consulting Services 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What Others Are Saying
"ROI Institute has been a pivotal partner in advancing the American Diabetes Association's evaluation efforts. Thanks to their innovative methods, we have collected feedback from thousands of learners, identifying gaps in our content and pinpointing opportunities to improve the education we provide. ROI Institute has managed the entire process seamlessly, requiring minimal effort on our part. Their evaluation reports are truly outstanding—comprehensive yet clear, making it easy for all stakeholders to grasp the insights and help us take action."
—Claire Stuve, PhD, MPH, 
Senior Director, Institute of Learning Science and Health Care, 
American Diabetes Association

Are your initiatives delivering the results that matter most? It’s time to stop guessing and start showing real impact. ROI Boot Camp is a one-day, virtual workshop designed to help you build the skills needed to demonstrate the value of your work. 
Here's What You Can Expect
Evaluation Strategies:
 Explore the five levels of evaluation to uncover key insights.
Proven Methodology:
 Understand the ROI Methodology®, aligned with ISO/TS 30347:2023 for measuring impact, validates the value of your initiatives.
Practical Applications: 
Learn to calculate benefit-cost ratio and ROI.
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp for $297 and take the first step towards elevating your impact and ROI!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What Others Are Saying
"ROI Boot Camp made the ROI process incredibly easy to understand and apply while helping me build the confidence to measure and communicate impact effectively."
"This workshop delivers invaluable skills at an affordable price—one day of training that pays for itself in measurable results."

Drive Real Business Results ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Show the Value of What You Do
March 13, 2025 — 2:00 pm CT
Proving and delivering value is more critical than ever. 
If you don’t show the value of your programs or projects, they could receive less funding, be ignored, or even cut. 
Whether you're focused on learning and talent development, innovation, AI integration, people analytics, or cultural transformation, ensuring your initiatives drive measurable impact is key to success.
So, how do you do it?
Join Patti P. Phillips, Ph.D., CEO, ROI Institute, as she shares strategies to help you:
 
 
 
 
 
 
✅ Align investments with organizational priorities
✅ Ensure solutions are practical, actionable, and results-focused
✅ Design strategies that deliver measurable value and impact
 
 
 
 
 
 
Discover how to showcase the true value of your efforts and drive real business results.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Register Now 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Unsubscribe
 | Sent by ROI Institute 
2803 Greystone Commercial Blvd, Suite 16 • Birmingham, AL • 35242

subject: The Metric HR Has Been Waiting For.
body:
Stop struggling to connect HR to business success. Discover the Human Success Score.
Hi Kelly,
Imagine this:
 You’re struggling to show how investing in your people translates to business success. Not anymore!
 
What if you could see, in real-time, how engagement, performance, and learning were converging to shape your company’s future results?
 
For too long, we've relied on lagging indicators like retention and eNPS, which fail to convey the urgency and impact of people's performance on business outcomes. That's why we're thrilled to announce the launch of 
Zensai's groundbreaking Human Success Score
.
 
The Human Success Score is a first-of-its-kind metric that provides an in-depth, predictive view, linking team effectiveness to future business performance. And gives you a clear, actionable picture of your organization's health.
 
Learning, engagement, and performance metrics are aggregated to provide a 
real-time pulse
 
on your organization's performance
 and produce a simple, qualified Human Success Score that is:
 
“Simple enough to understand and not overwhelm. 
Focused enough to trigger debate and action. Human enough to matter.”
David Perring, Chief Insights Officer at Fosway Group
 
Discover how Zensai's Human Success Score empowers HR with predictive insights to drive business success. Visit 
zensai.com/the-human-success-score/
 
 
Best regards,
Caroline
 
Zensai International, Mariane Thomsens Gade 4B, Aarhus C, DK 8000, Denmark
